name: Airlock
tag_list: security, secure-cloud, cloud-hosting, secure-hosting, secure-web-hosting, managed-hosting
overview:
Airlock makes it simple and affordable to set up a secure cloud.

The advanced features in Airlock’s secure cloud bring more power, control and security to your organization. And with Airlock’s simple set-up, you can be up and running in less than 5 minutes.

Security Fully managed, enterprise-level protection.

Airlock was born from the idea that true, enterprise-grade cloud security should be available to everyone, not just big corporations with massive budgets. Every Airlock account comes standard with all the security features you need: intrusion detection, hardware and web application firewalls, DDoS prevention, malware scanning and more. Plus, Airlock’s security gurus work around the clock to keep the network safe and reliable.

Every Airlock account comes standard with: Multiple Firewalls, Customer Isolation, Malware Scanning, Vulnerability Monitoring, Log Monitoring, Secure VPN

And protects against: Session Hijacking, Brute Force Login, DDoS Attacks, IP Spoofing, SQL Injection, Cross Site Scripting, Side-Channel Attacks, Packet Sniffing

Technology Blazing fast cloud technology.

Airlock built its cloud infrastructure on top of high-performance dual quad-core HP Blade servers, an eye-popping 10Gb/sec network, and a fully redundant architecture.

Rock Solid Hardware Airlock runs on high-performance dual quad-core hypervisors with dedicated ECC RAM and StorageWorks iSCSI clustered SANs for spectacular performance and maximum reliability.

Top-Tier Bandwidth All of Airlock’s cloud servers come with a premium, 1Gb/sec burstable network interface and unlimited bandwidth.

Global Content Delivery Accelerate your apps and websites with Airlock’s supercharged content delivery network (CDN). With 133 locations in 39 countries, the delivery speed of your content will increase by up to 70%. Starting at just 10¢/Gb.

High Availability Airlock’s state-of-the-art cloud technology features enterprise-class resilience with multi-layered security, a self-healing architecture and automatic hypervisor failover. Check out the 100% Uptime SLA for more details.

Control Panel Intuitively manage every aspect of your cloud.

Now anyone can set up a secure cloud environment. Because Airlock’s control panel features a simple interface, you don’t need a manual to find your way around. Features include quick access to user permissions, SSL certificates, firewall settings, load balancers, DNS, auto-scaling and more.

DNS Management Airlock’s robust DNS management allows you to easily add and manage domains on your cloud.

Cloud Server Controls Create, scale, rebuild, clone and backup your cloud servers in a snap. Plus, you can save time by using Airlock’s auto-scaling and backup tools.

Manage User Access Allow team members to control certain aspects of your account such as billing or scaling. Or use Airlock’s predefined user roles to assign permissions or create as many custom roles as you need.

Advanced Tools From load balancers, server snapshots and real-time usage charts to full web console access, Airlock has built in all the tools you’d expect and demand on a cloud platform.

Easy Setup Instantly deploy apps and frameworks.

Setting up a cloud environment for your app or website can be a real pain. LAMP stack, SFTP, DNS, SSL, Git … the list goes on. To solve this problem, Airlock partnered with JumpBox to integrate its entire library of more than 60 fully functional applications and development frameworks like WordPress, Joomla, Magento and Ruby on Rails.

Extensive App Library Airlock offers more than 60 apps and frameworks including WordPress, Drupal, LAMP and Ruby on Rails. Plus all the Linux distros you’d expect like Ubuntu, CentOS and Fedora. Browse Airlock’s full library of apps at www.airlock.io.

external_links.title: Airlock Delivers Simple, Secure Cloud Hosting with a Twist
